title: Broder Bros font
content:
Thanks in advance for identifying the font name for this logo.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201112012im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/broder_font_6584.jpg)

 [‹ Vintage catalog design sourcebook typeface or similar](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201112012/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50999 "Go to previous forum topic") [john lewis ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201112012/http:/www.typophile.com/node/51014 "Go to next forum topic")
author: thebuck

comments.content: Not sure it’s a typeface. [Co Headline](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201112012/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/dalton_maag/co_headline/?sample_text=broder&sample_size=60) and [Co Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201112012/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/dalton_maag/co_text/?sample_text=broder&sample_size=60) are similar.
Had a feeling it might be designed specifically for Broder. Much appreciated.
